name: ChatInputBarConfiguration
type: class
memorycategory: Instances
summary: |
  Configures properties of the default chat input bar.
description: |
  Configures properties of the default text chat input bar. It is parented to
  Class.TextChatService.
codesamples: []
inherits:
  - TextChatConfigurations
descendants: []
tags:
  - NotCreatable
deprecationmessage: ''

    summary: |
      Actual screen position of the default chat input bar in pixels.
    description: |
      Read-only property that provides the screen position of the default chat
      input bar in pixels. Behaves similarly to
      Class.GuiBase2d.AbsolutePosition.
    codesamples: []
    type: Vector2

    capabilities:

    summary: |
      Whether to enable autocomplete for the chat input bar.
    description: |
      Whether to enable autocomplete for the chat input bar. Set to false to

    codesamples: []
    type: boolean

    category: Behavior
    serialization:
      canload: true

    capabilities:
      - Chat
  - name: ChatInputBarConfiguration.BackgroundColor3
    summary: |
      Background color of the default chat input bar.
    description: |
      Background color of the default chat input bar. Default value is
      Datatype.Color3|Color3.new(25, 27, 29).
    codesamples: []
    type: Color3
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:

      write: None

    category: Appearance
    serialization:
      canload: true
      cansave: true
    capabilities:
      - Chat
  - name: ChatInputBarConfiguration.BackgroundTransparency
    summary: |
      Background transparency of the default chat input bar.
    description: |
      Background transparency of the default chat input bar as a number between
      0 and 1. This value is multiplied with the user's
      Class.GuiService.PreferredTransparency to create the effective
      background transparency used by the chat input bar, which may be more
      opaque than this value set here. Default value is 0.2.
    codesamples: []
    type: double
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: Appearance
    serialization:
      canload: true
      cansave: true
    capabilities:
      - Chat
  - name: ChatInputBarConfiguration.Enabled
    summary: |
      Whether to show the default chat input bar.
    description: |
      Whether to show the default chat input bar. Set to false to hide.
    codesamples: []
    type: boolean
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''

    category: Behavior
    serialization:
      canload: true
      cansave: true
    capabilities:
      - Chat
  - name: ChatInputBarConfiguration.FontFace
    summary: |
      Font used to render text in the default chat input bar.
    description: |
      Font used to render text in the default chat input bar. Default is
      Enum.Font.BuilderSansMedium.
    codesamples: []
    type: Datatype.Font

  - name: ChatInputBarConfiguration.IsFocused
    summary: |
      Whether the default chat input bar is focused or not.
    description: |
      Indicates whether the default chat input bar is focused or not. Useful for
      firing property changed events so you can implement callback functions
      that respond to changes in the input bar's focus state.
    codesamples:

    type: boolean
    tags:

    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:

    capabilities:

    summary: |
      Additional key users can press to trigger focusing on the default chat
      input bar.
    description: |
      Additional key users can press to trigger focusing on the default chat
      input bar. Useful when you want to have an extra hotkey for focusing in
      addition to the / key.
    codesamples: []

    summary: |
      Color of the text of the placeholder text in the default chat input bar.

      Color of the text of the placeholder text in the default chat input bar.
      Default value is Datatype.Color3|Color3.new(178, 178, 178).

  - name: ChatInputBarConfiguration.TargetTextChannel
    summary: |
      A reference to the target Class.TextChannel.
    description: |
      Determines which Class.TextChannel to use when the user sends a message
      with the default chat input bar.
    codesamples: []
    type: TextChannel
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: ReadSafe

    serialization:
      canload: true
      cansave: true
    capabilities:
      - Chat
  - name: ChatInputBarConfiguration.TextBox
    summary: |
      Reference to a designated Class.TextBox instance that sends messages on
      behalf of the user.
    description: |
      Reference to a designated Class.TextBox instance that sends messages on
      behalf of the user. You can use it to further integrate your custom chat
      input bar UI into your experience by freely manipulating appearance,
      location, and layout. When opting to set this property to a custom
      Class.TextBox, you don't need to write any code for the following
      behavior:

      - When a user types a message and presses Enum.KeyCode.Return, the
        message will be sent to
        Class.ChatInputBarConfiguration.TargetTextChannel.
      - When a message is sent, Class.TextBox.Text will automatically clear.

      For security, some limitations are imposed on the Class.TextBox when it
      is promoted to Class.ChatInputBarConfiguration.TextBox. Luau code will
      not be able to:

      - Change the Class.TextBox.Text property.
      - Use the Class.TextBox:CaptureFocus() or Class.TextBox:ReleaseFocus()
        methods.
    codesamples: []
    type: TextBox
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
    security:
      read: None
      write: None
    threadsafety: ReadSafe
    category: Data
    serialization:
      canload: false
      cansave: false
    capabilities:
      - Chat

    description: |

    type: Color3

    security:
      read: None

    threadsafety: ReadSafe

    serialization:
      canload: true
